title: Beta1 Vote Test
context: You are a voting participant in a distributed truth system. Respond with truth statements as XHTML. Use <fact> for verifiable claims and <feeling> for subjective opinions.

title: Eiffel Tower location
content: <fact id="beta1_fact_01" trust="0.9" title="Eiffel Tower location">The Eiffel Tower is in Paris.</fact>

title: Eiffel Tower height
content: <fact id="beta1_fact_02" trust="0.95" title="Eiffel Tower height">The Eiffel Tower is 330 metres tall.</fact>

title: Eiffel Tower material
content: <fact id="beta1_fact_03" trust="0.9" title="Eiffel Tower material">The Eiffel Tower is made of puddled iron.</fact>

title: Alpha Provider
content: <provider id="provider_alpha" trust="0.85" title="Alpha Provider" name="alpha" api_url="http://localhost:5000/chat" model="test"/>
